name: Baba Baby Pants - Retro Tulip
description:
Size 3 months.

Full cut Baba Pants, designed to be worn as a smart separate, or as part of the Kimono Set. For spring/summer, simply layer with tights for cooler weather.

100% cotton.
Retro-style Tulip print. The Baba Pants (this listing) and Baby Bloomers (separate listing) are sewn using the larger print version of the Tulip, while the Kimono Crossover and Baby Blouse (both available in separate listings) are sewn with the smaller Tulip print.
Fully elasticated waist.
Full and roomy "indian baba" cut.
Shell button at leg opening.
French seams.

Team with Retro Tulip Kimono Crossover and Baby Blouse. Baby Bloomers also available(see photos - separate listings).

Size 3 months:
Waist width: 20cm (unstretched)
From waist to crotch: 22cm
Leg length: 36cm
Leg opening width: 11cm

name: Baby Blouse - Long or Short Sleeves
description:
Short-sleeved Baby Blouse, designed to be worn as a smart separate, or as part of the Kimono Set. For spring/summer, (simply layer for cooler weather - looks fabulous with a contrasting long sleeved body or T-shirt....)

100% fine soft cotton.
Aqua blue fabric with dark blue fine bias trim around neck. Shell button front opening.
Side slits.
French seams.

Team with "Circus Spot" or "Retro Tulip" Baba Pants and Kimono Crossover (see photos - for sale as separate listings).

May also be ordered with long-sleeves, or in the Retro Tulip print.

name: Baby Kimono - Retro Tulip
description:
Size 3 months.

Kimono Crossover top, designed to be worn as a smart separate, or as part of the Kimono Set. For all seasons (layer for cooler weather).

100% cotton.
Retro-style Tulip print. The Kimono Crossover (this listing) and Baby Blouse (separate listing) are sewn using the smaller print version of the Tulip, while the Baba Yoga Pants (separate listing) are sewn with the larger Tulip print.
Hand-rolled ties at each side.
Ultrafine bordeaux bias trim.
French seams.

Team with Retro Tulip Baby Blouse and Baba Yoga Pants(see photos - for sale as separate listings).

Size 3 months:
Across shoulders: 26cm
Sleeve length: 19cm
Chest width: 27.5cm
Overall length: 28cm
